name: Inca Jungle 4 Days 3 Nights
description: The Inca Jungle to Machu Picchu offers the best activities in the región of Cusco and with the best multi adventure tour to Macchu Picchu. Breathtaking natural valley, coca, coffee and banana plantations surrounds us, we will do biking through the Andean Mountains combining with rafting on the Urubamba river, with hiking alongside small rivers seeing magnificent small inca paths along the way. This trip finishes with a complete guided tour around the complex of Machu Picchu, you can have the chance to climb Huayna Picchu the biggest peak located behind Machu Picchu or you can climb to the Machupicchu mountain on the way to the Inca trail.
